# 生命密码

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shengming-mima
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shengming-mima
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shengming-mima
shengming-mima <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shengming-mima
shengming-mima <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
